messages.message:
It looks from the other thread that there was an actual bug in generating flow without the form recognizer setting.

I also tried this without the multi-page tables setting and it worked quite well. I thought it might work without that feature because these docs are pretty short, and I'm pretty sure they fit in the LLM context window. The multi-page table feature is more for longer docs that don't fit in the context window.

Here is my sample prompt (`Extract the materials list as a table and return as markdown`) and it looks like it extracted all the tables correctly. This is tested on aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com (http://aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com).

It does seem to have some trouble with OCR of the numbers if the first column (which is a separate issue)
